sentences.sContent: The boxer punched his opponent on the nose.
sentences.sContent_eng: The boxer punched his opponent on the nose.
sentences.sCn: 拳击运动员朝对手的鼻子猛击。

sentences.sContent: The blow hit the boxer and he curled up on the floor.
sentences.sContent_eng: The blow hit the boxer and he curled up on the floor.
sentences.sCn: 一拳击中了拳击运动员，他被击倒在拳台上。

sentences.sContent: The young boxer has copped the prize of the first round.
sentences.sContent_eng: The young boxer has copped the prize of the first round.
sentences.sCn: 这位年轻的拳击手已获得了第一回合的胜利。

phrases.pCn: n. 拳击运动员短裤；男式平腿泳裤

words.tran: 拳击；装箱；围模；做箱的材料

trans.tranOther: someone who  box es  , especially as a job
